mapper.insert: insert into groupboard (groupno, categoryno, memberno, boarddate, boardcontents, boardnotice, boardlike, boardhate, requestboolean, filestatus) values (#{groupno}, #{categoryno}, #{memberno}, now(), #{boardcontents}, 0, 0, 0, 0, #{filestatus})
